HDG.QB.content: essence of nihilism is nothing nihilistic [a thought that palliates disagreeableness of thought of Verwindung of metaphysics] > Ge-stell when withdrawal of Being is represented nihilistically, that which presences as standing reserve (Bëstandigkeit) seems self-sufficient > X Being remains absent in strange way, maintains itself in a concealment that conceals itself [oblivion: a sheltering that preserves]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: essence of nihilism is nothing nihilistic [a thought that palliates disagreeableness of thought of Verwindung of metaphysics] > Ge-stell when withdrawal of Being is represented nihilistically, that which presences as standing reserve (Bëstandigkeit) seems self-sufficient > X Being remains absent in strange way, maintains itself in a concealment that conceals itself [oblivion: a sheltering that preserves]

HDG.LP.content: “so quiet” appears again and again in Trakl, quiet (leise) means slow (langam) > night, blue game, shy, gentle sheaf: “the sheaf of blueness gathers the depth (Tiefe) of the holy in the depths (Grund) of its bond” > holy withholds in withdrawing > Es [the holy] verschenkt seine Ankunft [bestows its arrival], indem es sich in den verhaltenden Entzug verwahrt [while/by guarding itself in its withholding withdrawal]
HDG.LP.linkedContent: “so quiet” appears again and again in Trakl, quiet (leise) means slow (langam) > night, blue game, shy, gentle sheaf: “the sheaf of blueness gathers the depth (Tiefe) of the holy in the depths (Grund) of its bond” > holy withholds in withdrawing > Es [the holy] verschenkt seine Ankunft [bestows its arrival], indem es sich in den verhaltenden Entzug verwahrt [while/by guarding itself in its withholding withdrawal]

HDG.LP.content: beneath the one semblance is concealed the Einfalt of pain, flaming the furthest when holds to itself most intimately [beholding vision] > pain as Grundzug of great soul, in pure harmony w/ holiness of blue: “blue shines upon the soul’s face by withdrawing into its own depth” > holy is present (west)/endures (währt) only by keeping w/in this withdrawal (in diesem Entzug verhält), turning vision toward fitting (Fügsame) [via flame of pain]
HDG.LP.linkedContent: beneath the one semblance is concealed the Einfalt of pain, flaming the furthest when holds to itself most intimately [beholding vision] > pain as Grundzug of great soul, in pure harmony w/ holiness of blue: “blue shines upon the soul’s face by withdrawing into its own depth” > holy is present (west)/endures (währt) only by keeping w/in this withdrawal (in diesem Entzug verhält), turning vision toward fitting (Fügsame) [via flame of pain]

HDG.WL.content: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)

HDG.WL.content: along the way, what looks like a tangle untangles [arrival?], release/light of way-making movement > movement brings Saying to speech, Saying keeps way open > die Be-wëgung der Sage zur Sprache ist das entbindende Band, das verbindet, indem es er-eignet [bond that binds by appropriating] > language delivered (entbunden) to its own freedom: concerned solely w/ itself > but language as Saying not only self-seeking, the appropriating showing disregards precisely itself, to free what is shown to its proper appearance [withdrawal of language, Saying, Ereignis]
HDG.WL.linkedContent: along the way, what looks like a tangle untangles [arrival?], release/light of way-making movement > movement brings Saying to speech, Saying keeps way open > die Be-wëgung der Sage zur Sprache ist das entbindende Band, das verbindet, indem es er-eignet [bond that binds by appropriating] > language delivered (entbunden) to its own freedom: concerned solely w/ itself > but language as Saying not only self-seeking, the appropriating showing disregards precisely itself, to free what is shown to its proper appearance [withdrawal of language, Saying, Ereignis]

HDG.EC.content: withdrawal of human existence from ground of thinking, burning pain, we were not permitted to be there for the unnecessary, couldn’t be young [not there in ontic]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: withdrawal of human existence from ground of thinking, burning pain, we were not permitted to be there for the unnecessary, couldn’t be young [not there in ontic]

HDG.OHF.content: “phenomenon” will become truly earnest matter if it turns that to be in mode of covering-up-itself (Sich-verdeckens) & self-veiling (Sich-verschleierns) [which constitutes object of philosophy] belongs to Seinscharakter des Seins [withdrawal of Being]: phenomenology in radical sense
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: “phenomenon” will become truly earnest matter if it turns that to be in mode of covering-up-itself (Sich-verdeckens) & self-veiling (Sich-verschleierns) [which constitutes object of philosophy] belongs to Seinscharakter des Seins [withdrawal of Being]: phenomenology in radical sense
